text: Sin Agbi sin Buqrek Toysa isin faxxa haytan kabuk sinni Buqrel fidoh xayyoowa xaylo edde geytaanamkeh, sinni Nafsih meqe taamoomiy Akeeral sin tanfiqe tatursuta, Yallak meesitaay Diggah isin Qhiyaamah Ayr√≥ kaat tangoorowoonu waytaanam ixiga, Nabiyow moominiin jannatal kaxxa maffaafal ken Aytukumus
